metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10241 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Jetty version 9.2.26 and older, 9.3.25 and older, and 9.4.15 andolder, the server is vulnerable to XSS conditions if a remote client USES aspecially formatted URL against the DefaultServlet or ResourceHandler thatis configured for showing a Listing of directory contents.

criterions.comment: jetty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
jetty8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
